CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, page 14, reads: "Preparing to Serve - This fine group of teachers and leaders in religious education posed for this picture, at the end of their study course at Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church, where the Pennsylvania Baptist Congress recently held its eighth annual session. Front center, William Flanagan; left to right: Mmes. Elizabeth Smith, Belle Lunn, Estelle Williams, Zenobia Scroggins (teacher), Henrietta Oden, Anna Roy, Alice Wright, Evelyn Alston, Pearl Haygood, Miss Sandra Jackson, Mrs. Mary Nelson and Miss Dolores Jackson. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of William Flanagan standing in front of, from left: Elizabeth Smith, Belle Lunn, Estelle Williams, Zenobia Scroggins, Henrietta Oden, Anna Roy, Alice Wright, Evelyn Alston, Pearl Haygood, Sandra Jackson, Mary Nelson, and Dolores Jackson, on stairs of Mt. Zion Baptist Church, horizontal version
